property.name: jdbc.driver
property.description: Class name of the JDBC driver (e.g. org.postgresql.Driver)

property.name: jdbc.url
property.description: The URL that the JDBC driver can use to connect to the database (e.g. jdbc:postgresql://localhost/postgres)

property.name: jdbc.user
property.description: User name for connecting to the database (e.g. postgres)

property.name: jdbc.password
property.description: Password for connecting to the database (e.g. postgres)

property.name: jdbc.pool.property.maximumPoolSize
property.description: The maximum number of actual connections to the database backend

property.name: jdbc.pool.property.connectionTimeout
property.description: The maximum time (in milliseconds) to wait for a connection from the pool

property.name: jdbc.pool.property.idleTimeout
property.description: The maximum time (in milliseconds) that a connection will sit idle in the pool

property.name: jdbc.pool.property.minimumIdle
property.description: The minimum number of idle connections to maintain in the pool
